dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4463 IH: To amend the Catawba Indian Tribe of South Carolina Land Claims Settlement Act of 1993.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Norman introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Catawba Indian Tribe of South Carolina Land Claims Settlement Act of 1993.

section.header: Future membership of the Catawba Indian Tribe of South Carolina
section.text: Subsection (d) of section 7 of the Catawba Indian Tribe of South Carolina Land Claims Settlement Act of 1993 (Public Law 103â€“116), is amended by striking ; however, in no event may an individual be enrolled as a tribal member unless the individual is a lineal descendant of a person on the final base membership roll and has continued to maintain political relations with the Tribe.
